languages.text: "Ж-жизнь? Я могу уйти?" {n}Пленник затравлено озирается по сторонам.{/n} "Неужто вы и впрямь... Простите, Ваша Светлость... Я думал, вы... а вы... Простите!"
languages.translation_comment:
Зик
анимация поклона после куя, Зик убегает

traits.locale_text: "Ж-жизнь? Я могу уйти?" {n}Пленник затравлено озирается по сторонам.{/n} "Неужто вы и впрямь... Простите, Ваша Светлость... Я думал, вы... а вы... Простите!"

languages.translation_comment:
Зик
анимация поклона после куя, Зик убегает

languages.text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"
languages.original_text: "Ж-жизнь? Я могу уйти?" {n}Пленник затравлено озирается по сторонам.{/n} "Неужто вы и впрямь... Простите, Ваша Светлость... Я думал, вы... а вы... Простите!"

traits.locale_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}The wounded man rises to his feet, nervously glancing around like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Begging your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... Forgive me!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}The wounded man rises to his feet, glancing nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Begging your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... Please forgive me!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

"P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

languages.text: "V-Verzeihung? Heißt das, ich kann gehen?" {n}Ziek sieht sich nervös um wie ein gehetztes Tier.{/n} "Habt Ihr wirklich ... "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... "Ich dachte, Ihr ... Aber dann ... Es tut mir so leid!"
languages.original_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

traits.locale_text: "V-Verzeihung? Heißt das, ich kann gehen?" {n}Ziek sieht sich nervös um wie ein gehetztes Tier.{/n} "Habt Ihr wirklich ... "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... "Ich dachte, Ihr ... Aber dann ... Es tut mir so leid!"

languages.text: «¿I... indultado? ¿Significa eso que puedo irme?». {n}Ziek lanza miradas nerviosas a su alrededor como un animal acorralado.{/n} «De verdad me... me ha perdonado, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Yo creía que usted... pero resulta que... ¡Oh, lo siento tanto!».
languages.original_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

traits.locale_text: «¿I... indultado? ¿Significa eso que puedo irme?». {n}Ziek lanza miradas nerviosas a su alrededor como un animal acorralado.{/n} «De verdad me... me ha perdonado, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Yo creía que usted... pero resulta que... ¡Oh, lo siento tanto!».

languages.text: 「は、はい…？行っていいのですか？」{n}ジークはまるで獰猛な動物のように神経質に周囲を見回した。{/n}「本当に…お許しくださるのですか、陛下…私はてっきり…でも…本当に申し訳ありません！」
languages.original_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

traits.locale_text: 「は、はい…？行っていいのですか？」{n}ジークは立ち上がり、まるで獰猛な動物のように神経質に周囲を見回した。{/n}「本当に…お許しくださるのですか、陛下…私はてっきり…でも…本当に申し訳ありません！」

languages.text: “原……原谅我？您是说我可以走了吗？”{n}齐耶克像受惊的野兽一样，紧张地环顾四周。{/n}“您真的……真的要原谅我吗，大人……？我本以为您会……可您……我真的很抱歉！”
languages.original_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

traits.locale_text: “原……原谅我？您是说我可以走了吗？”{n}齐耶克像受惊的野兽一样，紧张地环顾四周。{/n}“您真的……真的要原谅我吗，大人……？我本以为您会……可您……我真的很抱歉！”

languages.text: « P-pardon ? Vous allez me laisser partir ? » {n}Ziek darde des regards nerveux autour de lui, comme une bête acculée.{/n} « Vous avez vraiment... Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Je croyais que vous... Mais alors... Si vous saviez comme je m'en veux ! »
languages.original_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"

traits.locale_text: « P-pardon ? Vous allez me laisser partir ? » {n}Ziek darde des regards nerveux autour de lui, comme une bête acculée.{/n} « Vous avez vraiment... Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Je croyais que vous... Mais alors... Si vous saviez comme je m'en veux ! »

languages.text: "A... Anlamadım? Yani gidebilir miyim?" {n}Ziek paniğe kapılmış bir hayvan gibi gergin bir hâlde çevresine bakıyor.{/n} "Beni gerçekten... Affettiniz mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Sizin hakkınızda... Ama öyleyse... Çok özür dilerim!"
languages.original_text: "P-pardon? Does this mean I can go?" {n}Ziek glances nervously about like a harried animal.{/n} "Have you really... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I thought you... But then... I'm so sorry!"
